title: 44 Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: He thought of himself as being slightly on the Bohemian side, and had been a stalwart of amateur dramatic circles and the Savoy Opera Group. On more than one occasion he had appeared on the stage of the Churchill Theatre, most notably – and this was the height of his stage career – as the Duke of Plaza-Toro in The Gondoliers.

title: 44 Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: They're the ones in Morningside Road. They're not all that far down from the Churchill Theatre. Do you know where that is?

title: 44 Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: "Yes," said Ramsey Dunbarton. "The Dominion Fur Company was just over the road from the Churchill Theatre. We used to do Gilbert and Sullivan there.
